name: The Lego Soundmarine
description:
Note: This game requires a Lego set of a custom-made submarine containing gyroscopes and color sensors.

Dive with your soundmarine deep underwater to locate musical starfish and find Lego mineral bricks that will play the right music to resonate with them!

Instructions:

Start the game, turn on the Lego Soundmarine and be on the lookout for sad sea creatures as you tilt your Soundmarine to move around and scan the area.

Found a creature? Press the scan button up front to learn what musical pattern they like!

Now place two Lego musical mineral pieces (red, blue or green) into the loading bay of the Soundmarine and press the play button to have the minerals resonate with the sea creature.

If you do it right, the mission will be complete, and the corresponding light bulb for that sea creature will light up!

The game was developed at Nordic Game Jam 2022 by: Brian Bartram, Paul Ambrosiussen, Carolina Bermejo, Davide Frazzetto, Jorge Carrillo, Sofiia Skryhunets and Anchel Labena as part of the Lego fluid challenge.
